body.name: Corpower Wireless Retro Game Console, Built in 1500+ Classic Games HDMI Retro Game Stick Plug and Play Video Games for TV, with Dual 2.4G Wireless Controllers

features: 【HDMI HD Video Games】Enjoy retro video game on a big TV screen by using the mini HDMI cable connect to the TV and play hundreds of games instantly.. The wireless TV game console can connect to TV/TV Set-top Box/PC/Laptop/Projector.This video game console support high definition HDMI output.

【ShareThe Fun】his wireless retro handheld game console with built in games comes with 2 PCS 2.4GHz wireless game controllers, wireless connection between game controller and game stick, no line limit, more fun.With retro game consoles, your children can experience the experience and happiness of your growth and promote your communication and feelings with your children. (2 wireless controllers need to install 4 AAA batteries, Not included in package).

【Built-in 1500+ Retro Games】This is a retro TV video game console from the 80s of the last century that has collected many games from the last century. Integrated 1500different games. No need to download and install by yourself, no internet required, you can play 1500+ classic games just by connecting to the TV. Let you play games without repetition every day and bring back your memory to the fun of childhood, enjoy family entertainment time.

【Easy To Use】Here is a switch at the bottom of the wireless controller, and you can switch the No. 1 / No. 2 controller at any time.The No. 1 handle is the main control handle, and the No. 1 handle press the select+start button for 3 seconds to exit the game, and then press the SELECT button to return to the main menu.Press SECECT + START at the same time for two seconds to exit the game.

【The Best Gift】Retro Game Console Perfect for adult or kids of all ages as a birthday gift. Creat a happy childhood memories by playing with the whole family. Mini classic game console is a good choice as boyfriend gift, Thanksgiving/ Valentine's Day gift.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Corpower HDMI HD Video Games Enjoy retro video game on a big TV screen by using the mini HDMI cable connect to the TV and play hundreds of games instantly.. The wireless TV game console can connect to TV/TV Set-top Box/PC/Laptop/Projector.This video game console support high definition HDMI output.

Plug And Play Video Games You can take them anywhere, as long as there is an HDMI input interface(TV and Monitors，not computer and laptop）, you can plug and play anywhere and anytime. Please insert the TF card first Before connecting the power, please insert the TF card first, this TF card has been pre-installed 1500 games, so you can play a different game every day. Easy to switch between single and two player mode. Select game by controller P1 Select the first game handle as 1P and 2P for the second game handle. Place new batteries into controllers The battery is not included in the package, you need to prepare it yourself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the Price
reviews.reviewText: Controllers aren’t great, but still hours of fun for the $20 I spent. Wasn’t expecting something amazing at that price point but great for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great amount of games.
reviews.reviewText: this was easy to set up and had lots of retro games to choose from.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great variety of old school games… brought back lots of memories and love playing them. Controls suck balls. The glitch and get stuck and mess up your games. So… whoever watches you play, or is in listening distance, warn they to expect swearing and yelling! Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple hook up
reviews.reviewText: Kids love it just don't forget to get the batteries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap! Buy something better
reviews.reviewText: Most games are from the Atari era. Its very glitchy and the controls don’t respond immediately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids in a hotel room
reviews.reviewText: Corpower brings a collection of very old 8 bit games inspired by name brand ones from the late 80s/ early 90s in a great portable set up. The whole system is really in the controllers, plugs easily into almost any TV (including one in a hotel) and operates with no hassle for even kids to set up. So far the games are entertaining enough to keep the attention, and the controllers well built enough not to break with light rough-housing. For the size of the collection and how gift-able the set is, its a terrific value.
